name: BlueFletch
description:
BlueFletch is a mobile development agency focused on enterprise apps.
Our team helps enterprises develop line-of-business apps to support employees and customer engagement. We focus on Android Applications in the enterprise, but also build iOS and Web applications.  Additionally, we have a suite of tools to improve login, security, and SSO for employees on shared android devices.
Our Services Include:
Legacy Application Migration
Android Single Sign-On (SSO)
Android App Development
Rugged Android Dev (e.g. Zebra, Honeywell)
Mobile Strategy
MDM and Deployment Tooling
iOS App Development
Web and Backend Integration
Custom Android Login / Lockdown
